item.title: Dora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Never tell the truth to people who are not worthy of it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dora add a quote by Benjamin Disraeli
item.description: "There are three types of lies -- lies, damn lies, and statistics." -- Benjamin Disraeli

item.title: Dora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Truth is stranger than fiction, but it is because Fiction is obliged to stick to possibilities; Truth isn't." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "There are many humorous things in the world; among them, the white man's notion that he is less savage than the other savages." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you don't read the newspaper, you're uninformed. If you read the newspaper, you're mis-informed." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "A person that started in to carry a cat home by the tail was gitting knowledge that was always going to be useful to him, and warn't ever going to grow dim or doubtful." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Any emotion, if it is sincere, is involuntary." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Training is everything. The peach was once a bitter almond; cauliflower is nothing but cabbage with a college education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "It is sound judgment to put on a bold face and play your hand for a hundred times what it is worth; forty-nine times out of fifty nobody dares to call it, and you roll in the chips." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I was gratified to be able to answer promptly, and I did. I said I didn’t know." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I didn't have time to write a short letter, so I wrote a long one instead." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dora add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "Without contraries is no progression. Attraction and repulsion, reason and energy, love and hate, are necessary to human existence." -- William Blake

item.title: Dora add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "What is now proved was once only imagined." -- William Blake

item.title: Dora add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "A truth that's told with bad intent Beats all the lies you can invent." -- William Blake

item.title: Dora add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "To generalize is to be an idiot." -- William Blake

item.title: Dora add a quote by Edgar Cayce
item.description: "Great numbers of children will be born who understand electronics and atomic power as well as other forms of energy. They will grow into scientists and engineers of a new age which has the power to destroy civilization unless we learn to live by spiritual laws." -- Edgar Cayce

item.title: Dora add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dora add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster. And if you gaze long enough into an abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dora add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Art is the proper task of life. " -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dora add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "The surest way to corrupt a youth is to instruct him to hold in higher esteem those who think alike than those who think differently." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dora add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "In truth,there was only one christian and he died on the cross." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dora add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "All things are subject to interpretation. Whichever interpretation prevails at a given time is a function of power and not truth." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dora add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "The irrationality of a thing is no argument against its existence, rather a condition of it." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dora add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "We have art in order not to die of the truth." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dora add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "One must pay dearly for immortality; one has to die several times while still alive." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dora add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "But I don’t want to go among mad people," Alice remarked. "Oh, you can’t help that," said the Cat: "we’re all mad here. I’m mad. You’re mad." "How do you know I’m mad?" said Alice. "You must be," said the Cat, or you wouldn’t have come here." -- Lewis Carroll
